David, a little more info?
What build was this on..line numbers are changing daily?
Reproduceable...what seemed to have caused the problem?

I get this after suspending, then resuming a thread that was locked up from 
stepping into an Object.wait().  It seems to be caused by the tree items 
representing the stack frames in the launch view being mismatched from the 
acutal number of stack frames returned from the thread.  This could be the 
result of something we are doing (we are wrappering the jdt debug model).
David, do you have a reasonably small test case to reproduce this problem?

Fixed the array index out of bounds collection by handling the case where the 
number of frames returned by the model doesn't match the number of frames 
currently displayed in the tree. This was a simple oversight in the original 
implementation.

Please verify.
